feed.title: GoDoxy Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for GoDoxy: v0.14.2
entry.content:
Changes / Fixes

  • Routes: Incorrect URL for load balanced routes
  • Routes: remove x- routes on load to prevent from validation and showing up on home page
  • Metrics: fixed occasional divided by zero error on network speed / disk speed calculation
  • Security: updated go from 1.24.3 to 1.24.4

entry.title: New release for GoDoxy: v0.15.0
entry.content:
New

  • Idle-sleep: Support TCP/UDP routes (e.g. game servers). Tested with minecraft and palworld servers
  • Specify docker network via proxy.network label, e.g.

yaml services: app: image: nginx:latest labels: proxy.network: vpn networks: - vpn - local networks: vpn: external: true local: external: true

  • Specify agent for routes from route files, e.g.

yaml # app -> Oracle VPS's localhost:8080 app: port: 8080 agent: Oracle

Changes

  • Notification: Improve retry logic with exponential backoff
  • WebUI Login page: auto focus on username field
  • WebUI Proxies page
  • Long text in "Details" column is now collapsible
  • Moved "Provider" column to the left

Fixes

  • Docker: Wilcard labels proxy.* not working in some cases
  • Routes:
  • Fix routes with x- prefix being loaded and displayed
  • Fix TCP/UDP routes with a complete rewrite
  • Misc: edge cases that crashes with "call of reflect.Value.IsNil on string Value" when validating config files

entry.title: New release for GoDoxy: v0.15.1
entry.content:
Fixes

  • Docker: fixed wildcard labels proxy.* not working for FQDN aliases
  • Rules: fixed "internal server error" for routes with rules but without a default rule

entry.title: New release for GoDoxy: v0.15.2
entry.content:
Fixes / Changes

  • Notification: fix custom JSON payload validation for webhook provider
  • WebUI
  • Visuals: Improved visuals and animation for "Proxies" and "System Info" page
  • Routes
    • Display exposed ports for docker containers in proxies page
    • Add button for full detail in proxies page
  • Config Editor
    • Fixed missing provider field in Notification providers editor
    • Improved internal state management and performance

Screenshots

entry.title: New release for GoDoxy: v0.15.3
entry.content:
Fixes

  • Updated icon data URL for selfh.st to fix: failed to update icons error="invalid character '<' looking for beginning of value"
  • Fixed UI config editor not in sync with YAML editor
